original_text: The name of the first is the Pishon. It is the one that flowed around the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold.
korean_text: 첫째의 이름은 비손이라 금이 있는 하윌라 온 땅을 둘렀으며

sentences.original_text: The name of the first is the Pishon.
It is the one that flowed around the whole land of Havilah
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 온 하윌라 땅을 둘러 흐르는 강입니다.
